1.content:
It's 5 o'clock and you're in your room preparing for your date with James. You open up your wardrobe and look for a pretty outfit to wear for your date.
That will make him lost for words, when he meets you tonight.
1.title: Going on a date with James.

info.brief_description: You are playing the character of a young 14 year old girl called Isabelle.
info.description:
You are playing the character of a young 16 year old girl called Isabelle who goes to a school in Manchester and has a boyfriend called James.

James is a 16 year old boy who is your boyfriend and goes to the same school as you.

You have a best friend called Danielle, she is 16 years old. Who you've known since year 1 she is also in the same school as you.

You have another best friend called Janet, she is 16 years old. Who you've known since year 1 who is also in the same school.

At high school you're in a group of friends consisting of Megan; Sabrina, Charlie, Danielle, Jannet and You.

Danielle lives at home in Manchester with her Mother and her Father, who lives in London the capital city of The UK and England.

Isabelle lives at home in Manchester with her Father called Matthew and her Mother called Lottie who lives in Spain with her boyfriend Hernandez.


If you're going to edit this story please refrain from the following,
Changing the characters names.
Killing off any characters.
Adding any fetishes.
No politics especially from the (Labour party)
